name: Alagu Nandhini M
careerObjective: I am an enthusiastic full stack developer with a strong interest in building user-friendly and responsive websites. I have hands-on experience with the MERN stack and enjoy working on both frontend and backend development.

education.institution: Mount Zion College of Engineering And Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science Engineering

projects.name: Learning Platform - EasyLearn
description: Created a responsive platform with course listings, instructor profiles, and student testimonials.
Focused on intuitive layout and fully mobile-optimized UI using Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Hair Care Product Website
description: Developed a responsive e-commerce platform for natural hair care products.
Implemented product listings, search and filter functionality, and mobile-first design to ensure seamless user experience.

projects.name: Weather Forecast App
description: Built a real-time weather application using React.
Utilized API integration to display weather data and implemented reusable components and state management for dynamic UI updates.

projects.name: User Management System - CRUD
projects.technologies: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Prisma, MySQL, Tailwind CSS
description: Built a full-stack CRUD app to add, view, edit, and delete users.
Used Prisma with MySQL for backend and React with Axios for frontend.

certifications: Introduction to Web Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript - Meta (Coursera) - Issued Feb 2025
